author: gurukamath
content: Yes. Some clarity on this in the EIP document is required. So, if I understand it correctly, we don't allow delegations to pre-compiles in the first place.

author: jochembrouwer
content: These are valid i.e. not rejected, however if you try to run the delegated account it wont run any code (just like if you point a 7702 address to an empty account / account with no code)

author: gumb00
content: yeah it allows them, the address just will have leading 0s

author: lightclient
